description: Implement SupervisorOria agent to monitor agent heartbeats, retry failed tasks, and trigger idle recovery automatically.
Add heartbeat TTL checks for Cursor agents and mark tasks as stalled if no heartbeat within threshold.
Automatically dispatch recovery or reroute tasks when an agent stall is detected by the supervisor.
Integrate the code_applicator tool directly into Cursor agent workflow to auto-apply generated patches.
Develop end-to-end integration tests covering directive ingestion, task execution, result collection, and code application.
Implement auto-scaling controller to adjust the number of Cursor agents based on queue depth and throughput metrics.
Add a tool to detect and alert when JSON schema or directory structures drift from agreed canonical layouts.
